评论概述: Material is disappointing, fit is true.

It will wear well but it is not what I anticipated when ordering.
The vest came unpuffed so I did put it in the dryer with a ball and boom! It was perfect!!! It is definitely warm and looks great. I would recommend.

Bought this for my step sister for Christmas. It came in a vacuum sealed package so upon opening it, the vest was very wrinkled and thin feeling. I let it sit out and open hoping that may e some of the "puffiness" would essentially come back as the Pictures shows but unfortunately it hasn't. The picture makes it look like it's a thicker vest but it is not. It is thin. The picture does reflect like the imperfect type wrinkles but the way this came it is very wrinkled looking and does not resemble the picture at all. I'm not sure if this material can be steamed to get some out or not. I purchased a medium. Looks true to size. However it does look to be more of a semi crop vest in the picture but the actual vest seems to be between belly button and waist length so a little longer than the average crop style lengths. Overall, for the price i got what I paid for but not sure I will buy another.

The KEOMUD Women’s Winter Crop Vest is a fantastic blend of fashion and function! The lightweight material feels soft yet durable, providing just the right amount of warmth for chilly days without being too heavy or restrictive. The cropped design is super trendy and pairs perfectly with high-waisted jeans or leggings for a sleek, casual look. Despite its lightweight feel, the padding does an excellent job of keeping me cozy, and the stitching feels sturdy and well-made. It's also easy to pack and layer, making it a versatile addition to my winter wardrobe. If you’re looking for a cute and practical vest, this one is a winner!

评论概述: Warm and Comfortable, But Sizing Runs Large**
评论详情: I recently purchased the KEOMUD Women's Winter Crop Vest and have been mostly pleased with it. The vest is both comfortable and warm, making it a great choice for layering during the colder months. It's lightweight, yet provides enough warmth to keep me cozy without feeling bulky. It’s durable and easy to wash.  However, I found that the sizing runs large. I ordered an extra small, but it still feels too big for me. If you're considering this vest, I recommend sizing down for a better fit. Despite the sizing issue, it's a stylish and practical addition to my winter wardrobe. Overall, a solid choice for anyone looking for a warm and comfortable vest.
This was one of my favorite Amazon clothing purchases by far! Goes with so many outfits and has lasted me going on two years now :) highly recommend!

LOVE LOVE LOVE this vest. So cute and adds a the perfect layering piece to your fall/winter outfits. Very lightweight so if you’re looking for something to keep you warm, keep scrolling!  Loved it so much I purchased it in more colors!
